chapters.title: Chapter 4: A Deal
chapters.info: Aram, p. 152—Former Tuatha'an who gave up the Way of the Leaf to learn the sword when the Trollocs killed his mother. He learned from Tam al'Thor, Rand's father and a Blademaster, and picked it up extremely fast. He now serves as Perrin's personal bodyguard. Aram is slowly growing attached to The Prophet.
